narratives.description:
Senior managers of business analytics usually work in corporate headquarters with other members of senior management teams. They work primarily in offices and may occasionally travel to conduct presentations.
These senior managers are responsible for oversight, working with the business team, and reviewing reports and projections for potential future products and services. A bachelor's or master's degree and ten or more years of experience as a business analyst are generally required for this position. They must have a track record of proven success, and many senior managers are promoted from within the company.
A typical day may require meeting with teams of sales, product retention, or focus group research employees which are developing products or services to determine the associated risks. They may also be responsible for conducting presentations regarding sales figures of products and services to other senior executives.
narratives.summaryHourly: The average pay for a Senior Manager, Business Analytics is $77.50 per hour.
narratives.summarySalary: The average pay for a Senior Manager, Business Analytics is $132,531 per year.

tasks: Lead data-driven analysis, creating analytic models, to assist in developing business strategies.
Mentor and/or manage junior analytics team.
Lead cross-functional analytics collaboration to integrate data sets and drive strategic decisions.
Complete analytics reports and present insights to key stakeholders and business partners, recommending solutions.
Establish performance indicators and success metrics for proposed and existing initiatives, products, and/or services.

occupationalDetails.occupationalCategory: 15-1080.00 - Network Systems and Data Communications Analysts
occupationalDetails.skills: Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, SQL, Business Analysis, People Management, Statistical Analysis, Big Data Analytics, Strategic Planning, Tableau Software, SAS, Microsoft Excel, Project Management, Strategy, Data Modeling, Machine Learning, Python, R, Strategic Project Management, Web Analytics, Microsoft Power BI, Pricing, Microsoft Office, Strategic Marketing, Data Warehouse, Market Research
